Instrument.name: Long Wavelength Infrared Camera
Instrument.description: The Clementine Long-Wavelength Infrared (LWIR) Camera was designed to image darkside features on both the Moon and the near-Earth asteroid 1620 Geographos in the thermal infrared spectrum, and to allow measurement of thermal properties of material on both bodies, from which an assessment of regolith characteristics can be made. The Geographos phase of the mission was cancelled due to equipment malfunction.
